update sys_news set title=#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status=#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author=#{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, public_date=#{publicDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content=#{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, sys_flag=#{sysFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data_order=#{dataOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, del_flag=#{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date=#{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user=#{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user_disp=#{createUserDisp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_date=#{modifyDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_user=#{modifyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_user_disp=#{modifyUserDisp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, form_code=#{formCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data_index=#{dataIndex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audit_status=#{auditStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_code=#{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user=#{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date=#{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_id=#{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_name=#{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak1=#{bak1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak2=#{bak2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak3=#{bak3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak4=#{bak4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak5=#{bak5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak6=#{bak6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stype=#{stype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where data_id = #{dataId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select data_id, title, status, author, public_date, content, sys_flag, data_order, del_flag, create_date, create_user, create_user_disp, modify_date, modify_user, modify_user_disp, form_code, data_index, audit_status, company_code, update_user, update_date, project_id, project_name, bak1, bak2, bak3, bak4, bak5, bak6, stype from sys_news where 1=1
and data_id like '%${dataId}%'
and title like '%${title}%'
and status like '%${status}%'
and author like '%${author}%'
and public_date like '%${publicDate}%'
and content like '%${content}%'
and sys_flag like '%${sysFlag}%'
and data_order like '%${dataOrder}%'
and del_flag like '%${delFlag}%'
and create_date like '%${createDate}%'
and create_user like '%${createUser}%'
and create_user_disp like '%${createUserDisp}%'
and modify_date like '%${modifyDate}%'
and modify_user like '%${modifyUser}%'
and modify_user_disp like '%${modifyUserDisp}%'
and form_code like '%${formCode}%'
and data_index like '%${dataIndex}%'
and audit_status like '%${auditStatus}%'
and company_code like '%${companyCode}%'
and update_user like '%${updateUser}%'
and update_date like '%${updateDate}%'
and project_id like '%${projectId}%'
and project_name like '%${projectName}%'
and bak1 like '%${bak1}%'
and bak2 like '%${bak2}%'
and bak3 like '%${bak3}%'
and bak4 like '%${bak4}%'
and bak5 like '%${bak5}%'
and bak6 like '%${bak6}%'
and stype like '%${stype}%'
order by ${iSortCol} ${sSortDir_0}

select data_id as id ,title,content,status,author,public_date as createtime,public_date as updatetime,public_date from sys_news where sys_flag='ROOT_UNIVERSAL_WEHTHER_YES' order by updatetime desc limit 0,6
